summary: A group of U.S. Marines are sent to rescue a captured U.S. Marine and a Filipino Captain while stopping a group of Al-Qaeda-backed local rebels from launching biological weapons.
cast: Mark Dacascos|Theresa Randle|Rutger Hauer|Joe Suba|Zach McGowan|Joe Fozzy|Rey Malonzo|Ricardo Cepeda|Joe Mari Avellana|Ronald Asinas|Robert Escutin|Jerry Corpuz|Troy de Guzman|Reiven Bulado|Joel Giray|Monsour Del Rosario|Jorge Canias|Jun Collao|Jojo De Leon|Rudy Vic Del|Onchie Dela Cruz|Nash Espinosa|Ben Miller|Boy Roque|Manny Samson|Joey Tajanlangit
title: La caza del águila uno
